msbt.message: Fireworks show! Tonight! From 7 to midnight! I better see you there, 'cause it's gonna rock, !
You better get ready, 'cause the fireworks show is throwing down tonight at 7, !It's gonna be rad. Get one eyeful of that color splashing across the sky, and your troubles will all disappear!
Now there's the face of someone who needs to know about the big fireworks show. It's tonight at 7!Everyone's gonna be there, and that better include you, !
The fireworks show is almost heeere! I'm way too hyped up, but I just can't help it, ! So awesome!
The fireworks show's starting up soon! I can't wait to see how they're gonna open it, !
The show's almost on, and we've got some perfect fireworks weather. This is gonna be totally awesome!That sky's gonna look like a massive flower garden by the time they're done, ! So cool!
I'm still buzzing from the fireworks. Like, the show may be over, but it's still going in my head, .
I love the vibe of a place after a show ends. There's always a little echo left from the excitement, .
It's kinda weird how quiet and peaceful this place got after the fireworks show, .It's like, I almost wanna make some noise and bring that energy back but I'm digging the silence too.
OK, the fireworks shows were super rad, but now I gotta wait HOW LONG for the next one, ?I'm gonna need some help keeping my hype in check. You got my back, right, ?
I guess that does it for this year's fireworks shows. And I was getting used to 'em too, .I mean, we've had a fireworks show every Sunday for a month. I have no clue what I wanna do next Sunday

I couldn't believe how intense those last fireworks were. They really went all out! I can still feel the rumble!I can't wait to see how they're gonna top this year's shows. Every one of 'em was amazing, !
